body:
I finally lost it with the events table:

```
Events:
  FirstSeen	LastSeen	Count	From				SubObjectPath			Type		Reason		Message
  ---------	--------	-----	----				-------------			--------	------		-------
  10m		10m		1	default-scheduler						Normal		Scheduled	Successfully assigned oauth-proxy-4-build to localhost.localdomain
  10m		10m		1	kubelet, localhost.localdomain	spec.containers{docker-build}	Normal		Pulled		Container image "openshift/origin-docker-builder:v3.6.0-alpha.2" already present on machine
  10m		10m		1	kubelet, localhost.localdomain	spec.containers{docker-build}	Normal		Created		Created container with id 6af9e84999255d4c6270cd8da00896344d2c118656690e602b38d652b6998f5e
  10m		10m		1	kubelet, localhost.localdomain	spec.containers{docker-build}	Normal		Started		Started container with id 6af9e84999255d4c6270cd8da00896344d2c118656690e602b38d652b6998f5e
  10m		10m		1	build-controller						Normal		BuildStarted	Build default/oauth-proxy-4 is now running
  10m		10m		1	build-controller						Normal		BuildCompleted	Build default/oauth-proxy-4 completed successfully
  8m		8m		1	kubelet, localhost.localdomain					Warning		FailedMount	Unable to mount volumes for pod "oauth-proxy-4-build_default(2196c024-5496-11e7-8b4d-080027893417)": timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach/mount for pod "default"/"oauth-proxy-4-build". list of unattached/unmounted volumes=[docker-socket builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-push builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-source-image0 builder-token-327kh]
  8m		8m		1	kubelet, localhost.localdomain					Warning		FailedSync	Error syncing pod, skipping: timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach/mount for pod "default"/"oauth-proxy-4-build". list of unattached/unmounted volumes=[docker-socket builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-push builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-source-image0 builder-token-327kh]
```

A couple of things are wrong here. 

1. We are using tabs.  No.  Tabs are bad.  We have a tab writer for a reason, to write spaces that are better than tabs in every way (#47716)
2. The SubObjectPath column is a giant WAT.  Wastes 20% of horizontal real estate and conveys almost zero useful info.  That's what `kubectl get events -o yaml` is for.
3. The first three columns give me the same info over and over.  It should be compact, and remove useless info
4. Reason and Type are actually important for scanning, they should probably be up front.

Here's a quick revision that corrects these flaws (except for 4, which I'm not positive I like yet).  If an event is repeated it's `2m (x5 since 15m)`, although that may be too terse.  Regardless, we shouldn't waste column real-estate unless an event is repeated.

```
Events:
  When  From                            Type     Reason          Message
  ----  ----                            ----     ------          -------
  38m   default-scheduler               Normal   Scheduled       Successfully assigned oauth-proxy-4-build to localhost.localdomain
  38m   kubelet, localhost.localdomain  Normal   Pulled          Container image "openshift/origin-docker-builder:v3.6.0-alpha.2" already present on machine
  38m   kubelet, localhost.localdomain  Normal   Created         Created container with id 6af9e84999255d4c6270cd8da00896344d2c118656690e602b38d652b6998f5e
  38m   kubelet, localhost.localdomain  Normal   Started         Started container with id 6af9e84999255d4c6270cd8da00896344d2c118656690e602b38d652b6998f5e
  38m   build-controller                Normal   BuildStarted    Build default/oauth-proxy-4 is now running
  38m   build-controller                Normal   BuildCompleted  Build default/oauth-proxy-4 completed successfully
  36m   kubelet, localhost.localdomain  Warning  FailedMount     Unable to mount volumes for pod "oauth-proxy-4-build_default(2196c024-5496-11e7-8b4d-080027893417)": timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach/mount for pod "default"/"oauth-proxy-4-build". list of unattached/unmounted volumes=[docker-socket builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-push builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-source-image0 builder-token-327kh]
  36m   kubelet, localhost.localdomain  Warning  FailedSync      Error syncing pod, skipping: timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach/mount for pod "default"/"oauth-proxy-4-build". list of unattached/unmounted volumes=[docker-socket builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-push builder-dockercfg-xtqsh-source-image0 builder-token-327kh]
```
